title: Tearing Down History | Guest Host: Jeff Katz | Guests: Mark Morgan & Mike Lindell | 12/20/21
description:
Jeff Katz guest host the Glenn Beck Program. Who is the real president of the United States? And who is to blame for the turkey shortage? Many schools are going virtual again, and they say they need two weeks to flatten the curve. Former Commissioner of the U.S. Customs and Border Protection Mark Morgan joins the show to talk about the crisis at the border. Jeff Breaks down the problems with our public schools today. And PJ Morrissey calls into the show to talk about his sister’s bracelet business, Emily’s Bracelets, a company that helps people with disabilities. The left wants to erase history, and Jeff describes all the monuments that he has seen go down over the years. MyPillow founder Mike Lindell calls into the show to talk about his journey and what he has been up to lately. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
